content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of iron ore, and my inventory now reflects:
# - 2 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 8 stones
# - 10 iron ore
# - 5 copper ore
# - 1 copper plate
# - 4 copper cables
# - 1 iron gear wheel

# Now that I have iron ore, I can return to the stone furnace and smelt it into iron plates.

# I will move back to the stone furnace to insert 5 iron ore and sufficient coal to smelt them into iron plates.
move_to(Position(-5.0, 5.0))  # Move to the stone furnace location.
